Articles.Content:
Another new reliable concept design. The Swan.

The protoype not weaponized just yet, but it could probably fit six to ten bombs, a few railguns, and missiles attached to the ends of the wings.

As you may have noticed the most prominent feature of the Swan-42 is the combination of an X-wing and conventional jet wings put together, applying more than enough lift for easy gliding. Not only do they look good, but they also improve the rolling and yaw of the plane, which is not very common in most planes.

For the speed, it remains at it\'s expected standard, with a max from 1km to 1.5km under five kilometers above sea level.

---Answers to Questions Section---

WHEN DO YOU EVER STOP

Idk. Overclocked my biological clock last night because I slept 17 hours the day before.

Who knew that when you are sleepy you have the greatest ideas? Good thing I had a trusty paper and pencil next to my pillow.

Who knew that when you are sleepy you have the greatest ideas? Good thing I had a trusty paper and pencil next to my pillow.

so when youre sleepy you get EPIC ideas ???
